answers.answer: No, that is a separately ordered panel.

The only way they would be able to find out if you had that in your blood is if they were testing it specifically to see if it is there, because blood tests can only be tested for specific things at once, and they only look for what they're testing your blood for.

question: Will marijuana show up in tests fo thyroid liver kidney cholestrol and things like that??
title: Marijuana an routine blood tests for diabetes
